name: Monsterrific
description:
"Best collectible game EVER!"

"I cannot stop tapping!"

"I play this every day!"

"You do not have to pay to have FUN in this game!"


Break eggs by tapping to collect different monsters and wacky characters!

Can you collect them all? Even the ultra rare Legendary and Mythical monsters!

Easily share what monsters you have with your friends!


Join us on Facebook!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Monsterrific/396976683794798
